title: Amazon | SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier 3 college
YOE: 4+ years
Prior Experience: Startup
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE2 (L5)
Location: Bangalore
Salary Base: INR 47,00,000
Signing Bonus: INR 19,00,000 first year. INR 14,00,000 second year.
Stock bonus: 50k USD over 4 years
Relocation Bonus: 1,50,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): INR 70,50,000

title: OpenText | SSE | Bangalore | 8yrs Exp.
content:
Education: B.Tech
Years of Experience: 8 years
Date of the Offer: Nov. 2023
Company: OpenText
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Offered Salary: INR 33,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus:0
Stock bonus:0
Bonus:0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 33 LPA
Benefits: Gym Membership(12000), Medical Insurance, Profession Development Fees(65000)
Other details: Reviewing the offer letter

Can someone pls let me know whether I am being low balled here by the Organization.
I have asked for the salary range but I did not get it from HR.

Salary Negotiation has not happened yet.
Quick guidance would be helpful.

title: Goldman Sachs | Associate | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.tech from NIT
Years of Experience: 4+
Prior Experience: JPmorgan chase, working as SDE2
Date of the Offer: October 2023
Company: Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: Associate
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 32 LPA
Signing Bonus: 4 LPA
Stock bonus: No
Bonus: 8LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 44 LPA
Benefits: Insurance, transport, internet reimbursement and others
Accepted the offer!!

title: Google | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 8+ years
Date of the Offer: 2023
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 31 LPA
Signing Bonus: 2 LPA
Stock bonus: $55,000 over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 45 LPA
Benefits: Standard
Other details : Interview went well and definity not expecting this lowball offer . HR was bargaining tc like shopkeeper . Mostly will rejected this offer . Hearing lately they are doing firing/pip .. Anyone can throw light on this ?

title: Nykaa | SDE 3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B. Tech from tier1 college
Years of Experience: 6 years 7 months
Prior Experience: Atlassian SDE2 
Date of the Offer: 2023
Company: Nykaa
Title/Level: SDE3
Location: Bangalore
Base: 50 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3LPA
Bonus: 9LPA (Variable)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 62 LPA
Benefits: Standard benefits
Going with this offer as Atlassian has became worst after management change. Lot of silent pip and bad wlb

title: Microsoft | L62 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B-Tech CSE Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 6+ yrs
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L62
Location: Bengaluru
Fixed Salary: 30L INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3L INR
Stock bonus: 70000 USD divided across 4 yrs
Bonus: 0-20 %
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  48 LPA
Benefits: Standard Microsoft
Other details : Declined because of lowball and taken startup offer with better offer

title: Amazon | SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:

Details: Thanks to the wonderful leetcode community . Happy to clear interview after fired from Google in 3rd Quarter
